      set the TableView with the specified country list on the date of interest
      Parameters:
      fileOperator - The instance of CSVFileOperator
      datePicker - The DatePicker instance from the desired tab
      countryList - The CheckListView instance from the desired tab
      table - The TableView instance from the desired tab
      Returns:
      Boolean to indicate whether the table is set successfully
